message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000.  What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the exclusivity, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Let me know if this is something you can work with.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  I could meet you halfway at $12,000. This is a very generous offer considering the benefits it brings.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $11,000 for the product. Let me know if this is something you can work with.
